header.rec_loc: Living Room in a shared House in Finchley London; speakersâ€™ home.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Honeymoon, USA, Iceland, Boston, Portland Maine, Family, California road trip, San Francisco, LA, camping, hotels, motels, National Parks, desert, Outsider Art, food.
header.activity: Newly married couple reminiscing over what happened on their honeymoon about 6 moths ago.

speaker.dialect_rep: Non- regional - slight influence of American mother, lived in Cambridgeshire most of my life

body.u: so what was the first thing we did on our honeymoon? whwhen do you count our honeymoon starting? would you say it started when we arrived on the East Coast of America or did it start when we arrived in San Francisco?
I would start with the East Coast cos there were lots of good things that happened
got in quite late at night did we?
